content: While it is not yet ready for a review (waits for #2233 and #2249), feedback on the API of inverse.lean is welcome. There are many possible ways to choose API for these theorems, and I'm not sure if I've chosen the best one.

The main file is ready for review. There are many different ways to choose API for inverse/implicit function theorems, and I'm not sure that I made the right choices.
I'll split my changes to other files into smaller PRs, and drop some of them from #2228 because current version of inverse.lean doesn't use them.
